params.label: $hImage
params.documentation:
If specified, then <_GEng_Sprite_ImageSet> will be called,
and the sprite will be assigned *hImage* Image object

_GEng_Sprite_ImageSet.documentation: Validate all the drawings (Sprites, Text) and update the screen
_GEng_Sprite_ImageSet.label: _GEng_Sprite_ImageSet(ByRef $hSprite, ByRef $hImage, $x = Default, $y = Default, $w = Default, $h = Default)

params.label: $x
params.documentation: Top left corner position of the rectangle

params.label: $y
params.documentation: Top left corner position of the rectangle

_GEng_Sprite_ImageSetRect.documentation: Specifiy the part (rectangle) of the Image Object actually assigned to the Sprite that will be drawn
_GEng_Sprite_ImageSetRect.label: _GEng_Sprite_ImageSetRect(ByRef $hSprite, $x, $y, $w, $h, $InitSize = 0)

params.label: $InitSize
params.documentation: If TRUE, the size of the sprite will be set to the size of the rectangle

_GEng_Sprite_Draw.documentation: Draws a sprite at it's current position and angle
_GEng_Sprite_Draw.label: _GEng_Sprite_Draw(ByRef $hSprite, $iCalculateMovements = 1)

params.label: $iCalculateMovements
params.documentation:
If TRUE, then sprite is concidered as dynamique, so speed,
acceleration, innertia... will ba calculated befor drawing
